text: John E. Nelson (born December 29, 1935) is an American politician who served as the 40th Lieutenant Governor of Nebraska from September 29, 2014 to January 8, 2015 under Governor Dave Heineman. He is a member of the Republican Party.Heineman names new lieutenant governor ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Nebraska Category:Members of the Nebraska Legislature Category:Lieutenant Governors of Nebraska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John E. Nelson (Nebraska politician)
